inclusion.criterion: will be recruited for the test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performance and execution of MOCA test:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fingerstick blood glucose for pre-cognitive testing performed (to avoid testing any participant with a serum glucose < 70 mg/dl);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In the presence of hypoglycemia, the participant should be given a snack and begin the test only after the glucose level rises. Alternatively delay executing the Test Details from the patient's file are registered, such as: duration of the disease, family history, presence of macro and micro vascular complications, lifestyle, years of education, and the results of relevant laboratory accuracy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For each patient a medical file is opened containing the initials and serial number of his research. All results are then encoded and analyzed anonymously
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: up to 15 years of diabetes disease duration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: fluent speech and read hebrew's language only
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: chronic use of alcohol or illegal drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: use of medication that can alter the attention or cognition of the participant
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: active cardiovascular disease in the previous six months before the investigation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: oncology disease in the previous six months before the investigation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and is within the age range for the study. However, he has a history of cardiomyopathy which may be relevant to his cardiovascular health.
